significance: An uncharted island inhabited only by an elderly man named Zenny and numerous goats. The island features a mountain with a ship built on top.

keyEvents.title: Marine Fleet Surrounds Goat Island
keyEvents.description: The Marines set up a trap around the island to capture the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Zenny's Ship Slides Down the Mountain
keyEvents.description: Zenny's ship slides down the mountain and launches into the ocean in a dramatic scene.

keyEvents.title: Goats Trample Minchey
keyEvents.description: Zenny's loyal goats charge and trample the corrupt Marine officer Minchey.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Goat Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates say goodbye to Zenny and depart from the island.

features: Mountain with a ship on top
trivia: The island is anime-only and does not appear in the manga
The island's main feature is Zenny's ship which was built on the mountain over many years
The goats on the island ate Zenny's money, becoming his true treasure
